comments.comment: Oi thamuseth Fonseka wage bala perethakamak thiyenne. Thamuseta yana enaman naaa. Ape pauluth wada kalaa thamuseta.. thamusegen satha pahaka deyak ape paula labagena naa. Namuth thamuse karapu jada kam apith dannawa. Ekanisaa kata wahagena innawa. Puka nodi UNP ekata.

comments.comment: S.W.R.D. Bandaranayake is the one who formed SLFP. He is English educated person his families even Chadrika live in England. They all derail Sri Lankan showing the wrong picture to get the power. N.M perera too also British educated. Now JVP too go to Canada and Ireland just visit. Why cant they go and see the people in cremia Ukraine and Former Yugoslavia. They know the truth but hiding the truth. Last 70 years sri lanka had destroyed by Sri Lankan ( SLFP and JVP rural goons) not by British or their alliance like USA. Where is my country after British left. Mafia professionals. Oh my country!
